story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_0100: You did a fantastic job, everyone!
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_0200:
Thanks to you, the town is back to normal, and all
injured Pokémon are being treated.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_0300:
It’s unfortunate that we couldn’t capture Giovanni
this time, but more importantly, I’m glad you’re
all safe.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_0500:
I guess we didn’t have to worry about you
after all!
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_0600: Yes. You all fought so bravely out there.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_0700:
I’m glad we could help...but I still need to
do more.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_0800:
Kanto Trainers sure are strong! You were so
cool, too!
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_0900: Yeah, we were all in top form, weren’t we?
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_1000:
Anyways, thanks for all the help! We should all
team up again sometime!
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_0401_1200: Sweet! I’m looking forward to it.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_0402_1400:
Yeah, I’ll be there for sure. I’m a man of
my word, after all!
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_1500:
But just remember...now everyone on Pasio is
aware of what kind of power sync stones can
create when they’re abused.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_1600:
I’m worried that other organizations may follow in
Team Rocket’s footsteps.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_1700:
There’s no time to lose, then. We’ll have to be
ready for that.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_1800:
But also remember, we’re all still here on Pasio to
protect it!
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_2000:
Apparently, Lear sent out a formal request to the
International Police because of what happened.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_2200:
Yes. They’re a police organization focused on
bringing down evil organizations in the name
of justice.
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_2300: That’s pretty cool. I wonder who they’ll send!
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_2400:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I think you and
everyone else should get some rest and prepare
for what’s coming!
story_teamrocket_01_27000/2401_1201_2500:
It looks like we may have to call on you for help
again in the near future!
